text: Chiung Yao or Qiong Yao (; 20 April 1938 – 4 December 2024), pen name of Chen Che (), was a Taiwanese novelist and producer. She was seen as the most popular romance novelist in the Chinese-speaking world. Her novels have been made into more than 100 movies and TV dramas. Her best known works were Outside the Window, Fire and Rain and My Fair Princess. She was born in Chengdu, Republic of China. Her career began in 1962. Chiung committed suicide on 4 December 2024 at her home in Tamsui District, New Taipei City at the age of 86. ==References== ==Other websites== * Chiung Yao's official website * 琼瑶作品集 * Category:1938 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Suicides Category:Taiwanese novelists Category:Movie producers Category:Television producers Category:Songwriters
title: Chiung Yao
